title: Product Marketer / Sales Representative Job at Zooad HR Partner
content:
At Zooad HR Partner we believe that people are the backbone of any successful organization. That's why we're dedicated to providing innovative HR solutions, outsourcing services, and training programs that empower businesses and enhance people. We're not just an HR consulting firm; we're passionate advocates for business growth, employee development, and organizational excellence. Our team of experts has extensive experience in HR consulting and outsourcing, and we're committed to delivering personalized solutions that meet the unique needs of each client.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Product Marketer / Sales Representative
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We're seeking a results-driven Product Marketer/Sales Representative to promote our products and drive revenue growth.
	As a key member of our sales team, you'll develop and execute sales strategies, build strong customer relationships, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve business objectives.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement sales strategies to meet revenue targets
	Identify and pursue new business opportunities
	Collaborate with marketing team to develop effective sales materials and campaigns
	Present product demonstrations and pitches to potential customers
	Build and maintain strong relationships with customers and partners
	Conduct market research to stay up-to-date on industry trends and competitor activity
	Negotiate and close deals to meet sales targets


Requirements


	1+ years of experience in sales, marketing, or business development
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills
	Strong product knowledge and ability to understand complex technical information
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills


Preferred Qualifications:


	Experience in product marketing, sales, or a related field
	Familiarity with CRM software and sales tools
	Strong networking and relationship-building skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.


What We Offer


	Salary: N120,000 - N200,000 Monthly.
	Competitive salary and commission structure
	Opportunity to work with a dynamic and growing company
	Collaborative and supportive work environment
	Professional development and growth opportunities


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume and cover letter outlining their qualifications and experience to: zooadpartnes.hr@gmail.com using "Inventory Staff Application - Abuja" as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you're a motivated and results-driven sales professional looking for a challenging and rewarding role, apply.

title: Hospital Administrator Job at Kelina Hospital
content:
Kelina Hospital is a surgical hospital, with a focus on Minimally Invasive Surgery. Kelina was the first private hospital in Nigeria to do Laser Lithotripsy for Kidney Stones (PCNL, RIRS, 2011), Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy, LRP (2012), and Holmium Laser Enucleation of the Prostate (HoLEP, 2018). Kelina does Laparoscopic Surgery in General Surgery, Urology, Gynaecology amongst others. HoLEP, LRP, PCNL, RIRS are the most common surgeries we do each week.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Hospital Administrator

Job Location: Off Adeola Odeku Street, Victoria Island - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Chief Admin Officer reporting only to CEO and Board.
	Chief Admin Officer in charge of coordinating and supervising all HODs.
	Responsibility for business, growth, customer satisfaction, hour-by-hour, day-to-day smooth operations of every aspect of the hospital, including facility, Plant and HR management.


Requirements
To be eligible, candidate must:


	Be University Graduate with relevant certifications.
	Be resident in Lagos.
	Have post-NYSC job experience in administration, especially in related fields supervising not less than 50 staff.
	Be highly computer-skilled.
	Be certified by relevant professional bodies where this applies.


Remuneration
Not less than N6,000,000 per annum.

title: Customer Care Representative Job at Kaelot Gift Shop
content:
Kaelot Gift Shop, Nigeria's leading Gifting Company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Representative

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Start Date: Immediate

Summary


	Are you friendly, organized, and passionate about creating amazing customer experiences? We’re looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Customer Care Representative to join our team!


What You’ll Be Doing
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Welcoming and assisting walk-in customers with a warm, helpful attitude
	Processing orders quickly and accurately for both in-store and delivery customers
	Managing inventory—stocking, counting, and making sure nothing goes missing
	Keeping the store clean, tidy, and beautifully arranged every day.


You’re a Great Fit If You


	Communicate clearly and confidently
	Are proactive and can multitask without breaking a sweat

	Live in or near Ikeja and can resume work on time, every time.


Salary
N65,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their cover letter and CV to: hrkaelot@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Front Desk Officer Job at TeamAce Limited
content:
TeamAce Limited - Our client, a leading Aesthetic Clinic, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
Job Location: Lagos,
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Front Desk Officer, you will be responsible for managing patient interactions, scheduling appointments, and performing general administrative duties to ensure a smooth and welcoming front desk experience.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Greet and attend to patients warmly and professionally
	Manage appointment bookings and handle inquiries across all platforms
	Maintain patient records, ensure confidentiality, and follow up on scheduled visits
	Handle payment processing and follow-up for outstanding balances
	Monitor and update the clinic inventory, including consumables and materials
	Support administrative tasks and coordinate daily clinic flow.


Requirements


	OND/HND is required
	Minimum of 2 years with HMO experience
	Knowledge of labor laws and HR best practices.


Salary
N130,000 - N150,000 per month.
